name: Carrot
text: On Play: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, place them at the top or bottom of your deck in any order. On Opponent's Attack: You may trash this Character: Give up to 1 of your Leader's +1000 power during this battle.

You may trash this Character: Give up to 1 of your Leader's +1000 power during this battle.
